summary: Build a professional, responsive single-page marketing website for "A1 Mart" (multi‑product store) with sections Home, About, Products (4 categories), and Contact (email form + social links) using a dark green/cream palette.
architectural_notes: Static HTML/CSS single-page site using Font Awesome 6 CDN for icons.
Contact form posts to FormSubmit endpoint and uses hidden fields for subject/captcha/next redirect.

existing_features.title: Implement a responsive single-page landing site for “A1 Mart” with a sticky top navigation bar that uses in-page anchor links to sections: Home, About, Products, Contact.

Apply A1 Mart branding and styling across the page using a professional dark green and cream palette (primary #1A4D2E, accent/background #F5EFE0), with bold typography, rounded cards/buttons, and consistent spacing.

Build the Home section hero with headline, supporting copy, and two call-to-action buttons linking to Products and Contact; include a secondary highlighted panel emphasizing “Trusted by busy professionals” and “for business & beyond”.
Build the About section (“Our story & mission”) with the provided narrative text (founded in 2020, sustainability/fairness, mission statement) and an adjacent trust highlight card (“100% trusted”).

Implement the Products section showing exactly four category cards: Bags, Toys, Electronics, Clothing; each card must include an icon, a short subtitle, and a starting price line (“from $19/$9/$29/$15” respectively).
Add the Products section quality banner text: “100% genuine products — fast delivery — easy returns”.
Implement the Contact section with a functional HTML form that submits to FormSubmit using the exact action URL and hidden fields from the provided HTML, including destination email and redirect URL.

Add a social links row in the Contact section that includes an Instagram button linking to the exact provided URL; include optional secondary placeholder buttons for X/Twitter and Facebook that do not break navigation.
Add the extra informational strip section (FAQ / free shipping / visit showroom) as a simple responsive three-item highlight row.

Implement the footer with the provided 2025 copyright/branding line, a palette note mentioning dark green (#1A4D2E) and cream (#F5EFE0), and a note that a logo will be provided later (using a placeholder for now).

Create a coherent visual theme consistent with a premium “dark green + cream” retail brand: set global typography scale, button styles, card radii/shadows, and section background alternation, and apply it consistently across all sections without introducing new product features.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create A1 Mart single-page layout with sticky navigation and anchor links (Home, About, Products, Contact)
Implement Products section with 4 category cards (Bags, Toys, Electronics, Clothing) including icons and starting prices
Add Contact section with working form submission via FormSubmit (to merealam0786@gmail.com) and success redirect
Add social links row including Instagram link to visionxgaming3 (plus optional X/Twitter and Facebook placeholders)
Apply A1 Mart branding: dark green (#1A4D2E) + cream (#F5EFE0) color palette, bold professional styling, responsive behavior
Include logo placeholder "A1" with note that a logo file will be provided later
Add footer with 2025 copyright/branding text and palette note
